metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12699 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
finish_stab in stabs.c in GNU Binutils 2.30 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by an out-of-bounds write of 8 bytes. This can occur during execution of objdump.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12699` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3').
